channel.title: [DELTA]Can some fix this code please :)? (code provided)

item.title: [DELTA]Can some fix this code please :)? (code provided)
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

public void getHead(){ if(ProtMage && !isSkulled) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange && !isSkulled) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee && !isSkulled) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution && !isSkulled) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption && !isSkulled) headIcon = 32; if(Smite && !isSkulled) headIcon = 16; if(ProtMage && isSkulled) headIcon = 68; if(ProtRange && isSkulled) headIcon = 66; if(ProtMelee && isSkulled) headIcon = 65; if(Retribution && isSkulled) headIcon = 72; if(Redemption && isSkulled) headIcon = 96; if(Smite && isSkulled) headIcon = 80; else if(!ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite) headIcon = 64; } public void turnOffHead(){ if(ProtMage) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption) headIcon = 32; if(Smite) headIcon = 16; else if(!isSkulled && !ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite) headIcon = 0; }

I believe there’s something wrong with your sprites, because this code posted is also from a delta source, and it works just fine.

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]Can some fix this code please :)? (code provided)
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

if(isSkulled){
headIcon = 1;
}

That must mean that the headIcon 1 is the skull image.

This:

if(ProtMelee && !isSkulled)
headIcon = 1;

Needs to be changed to:

if(ProtMelee && !isSkulled)
headIcon = # of the Protect Melee headIcon;

I would help you further by tell you which headIcon number it should be changed to, but I don’t know any general information about Delta, so good luck with that part.

Read full topic
item.source: [DELTA]Can some fix this code please :)? (code provided)

item.title: [DELTA]Can some fix this code please :)? (code provided)
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

My source has it where protect from melee is a skull
Does anyone know how to fix this code?

public void checkHead(){ if(!isSkulled){ headIcon = 0; } if(isSkulled){ headIcon = 1; } } public void getHead(){ if(ProtMage && !isSkulled) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange && !isSkulled) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee && !isSkulled) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution && !isSkulled) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption && !isSkulled) headIcon = 32; if(Smite && !isSkulled) headIcon = 16; if(ProtMage && isSkulled) headIcon = 68; if(ProtRange && isSkulled) headIcon = 66; if(ProtMelee && isSkulled) headIcon = 65; if(Retribution && isSkulled) headIcon = 72; if(Redemption && isSkulled) headIcon = 96; if(Smite && isSkulled) headIcon = 80; else if(!ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite) headIcon = 1; } public void turnOffHead(){ if(ProtMage) headIcon = 4; if(ProtRange) headIcon = 2; if(ProtMelee) headIcon = 1; if(Retribution) headIcon = 8; if(Redemption) headIcon = 32; if(Smite) headIcon = 16; else if(!isSkulled && !ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite) headIcon = 0; }

thanks

Read full topic
